node.excerpt: We’ve just opened registrations for multi-mania 2008! Multi-Mania is a yearly one-day conference and award show in Kortrijk (Belgium) where 800 people from the multimedia industry in mid Europe come together to share knowledge, to get inspired or to connect and network. More then 30 speakers from…

We’ve just announced the first names for multi-mania! Peter Elst, Jason Levine, Ralph Hauwert, Dave Schroeder, Stephanie Sullivan, Aral Balkan, and Marco Casario will speak at our event. It’s also possible to sign up for our open awards. Send in your work in one of our 4 open categories, and maybe…
Multi-Mania 2008 was just announced! This year’s edition will take place on friday 23th of may 2008 in the XPO meeting centre, Kortrijk. Already looking forward to this awesome multi-media fest!
